summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeColourPop's Super Shock Shadow is a long-lasting cr√®me-to-powder formula that delivers supercharged colour in just one swipe. It's super creamy, insanely pigmented and blends like a dream.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-lasting formulaSuper pigmentedHigh impact colour in one swipeEffortlessly blendableSuper versatile for endless eye looksMinimal creasing, fading or falloutItem 2569217How To UseFor max coverage: Use your fingertip and tap shadow directly onto the eyelid. A flat, firm synthetic brush will also work and is perfect for detailed application close to the lash line.To blend: Use a fluffy synthetic brush with good movement, dip the tip into the shadow and apply with a ''windshield wiper'' movement throughout the crease of the eye for a soft and diffused look.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isododecane, Boron Nitride, C30-45 Alkyl Cetearyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cyclohexasiloxane, Dimethicone/Vinyltrimethylsiloxysilicate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Tin Oxide, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Mica (CI 77019), Titanuim Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: For max coverage: Use your fingertip and tap shadow directly onto the eyelid. A flat, firm synthetic brush will also work and is perfect for detailed application close to the lash line.To blend: Use a fluffy synthetic brush with good movement, dip the tip into the shadow and apply with a ''windshield wiper'' movement throughout the crease of the eye for a soft and diffused look.

reviews.headline: Great color!
reviews.comments: Love this!

reviews.headline: It's called ColourPOP for a reason!
reviews.comments: This little eyeshadow pot is amazing! It's pops and is very shimmery. It stays on all day with primer and setting spray, even at an outdoor august wedding. It looks perfect! I'll be buying more of these in the future.

reviews.headline: I love this so much my new fav!!
reviews.comments: So pigmented!!

reviews.headline: tried and true!
reviews.comments: love all my super shock shadows, they're always creamy and go on perfect with my finger. the pigment is always there and they don't dry out for YEARS. picked up the shade ritz this time, and it's a perfect dupe for UD space cowboy. beautiful shimmer over a warm nude.

reviews.headline: Beautiful but isn't the color it looks at first
reviews.comments: This is a very beautiful and very smooth feeling eyeshadow. But it looks almost like a black eyeshadow with blue glitter or shimmer to it, but when you swatch it, it's actually like a deep red or pink with that blue shimmer.

reviews.headline: I would definitely recommend
reviews.comments: Love the product so much, such beautiful colors and I would definitely buy and recommend to anyone looking for a pop of color

reviews.headline: Veeyvexpensive, not much product, and very light
reviews.comments: Poor quality

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS SO MUCH
reviews.comments: This stayed all day while at a fair! Did not crease either! No fallout and its beautiful, many compliments!

reviews.headline: I LOVE THESE!
reviews.comments: i have just about every shade of these shadows!

reviews.headline: Don't buy this from Ulta online.
reviews.comments: Super Shock Shadow is one of my favorite eyeshadow formulas! It's a hybrid formula, not quite powder, not quite cream, so you have to treat it a little gently. Great for an easy one-color look or for blending and layering (as long as you are using other colors of the same formula! I find this doesn't play well with others, hence the loss of one star). Also of note: These babies are fragile, so it's never a good idea to order from Ulta online. Buy in store if you can, or if you have to have them shipped order from CP directly as they are aware of the delicate nature of the item and package it accordingly. I broke my own rule recently and ordered from Ulta and it arrived completely smashed. I contacted the help desk, they quick sent out a replacement order, and it arrived smashed as well.

reviews.headline: I would buy again and highly reccomend
reviews.comments: this glitter is so sparkly!!! I love it, I have yet to find another product as shiny as this one!! I highly reccoment and I will be purchasing more!

reviews.headline: Inconsistent among colors
reviews.comments: I have some that I love and some that I threw out because I hated them so much. Quality and performance vary by shade. Keep in mind these are like a creamy/wet powder texture and don't really play well with powder eyeshadows. I really like Moonwalk.

reviews.headline: Not my favorite
reviews.comments: It came broken, the first time I opened it the whole thing fell out. It was really hard to apply and it was really glittery. Also it  was super hard to even out. Not worth it.

reviews.headline: Pretty
reviews.comments: Gorgeous color and sparkle

reviews.headline: My favorite for years
reviews.comments: This goes on so nicely. It's a powder but it's not at all dry, it almost has a creamy consistency. I love it. I just bought my third one.

reviews.headline: I will buy this again
reviews.comments: It definitely makes your eyes pop

reviews.headline: I Like The Colors.
reviews.comments:
Different Type Of Glitter.
Blue.

reviews.headline: Roy G Biv
reviews.comments: I love how the Roy G Biv shade is similar to the Nars Orgasm line: its a warm pinky color with gold flecks. I got this to use a blush (but also shadow) because I've been dying to have a blush that has actual sparkle and glitter to it so this works perfectly!

reviews.headline: One of the best & mostaffordable eyeshadows I've ever used
reviews.comments: I've been using Colourpop Eyeshadows for quite some time. They have amazing longevity and color payoff. The shimmers are so shimmery and they glide in like a dream. The palettes feature such wearable color stories.

reviews.headline: Not good eyeshadow
reviews.comments: I got rhe shade Frog looking for a pink glittery eyeshadow for brown skin. It applied as just straight glitter. Not a speck of pink pigment whatsoever to be found on my eyelid

media.headline: Had been looking for a good gold. This was it

faceoff_positive.comments: These shadows have made me get rid of several palettes I've used for years. The color payoff is ridiculous. Go look at some videos  showing how these are used and I promise you will buy them all...
faceoff_positive.headline: Gorgeous and fun

faceoff_negative.comments:
I used Wattles 3 days in a row as a one and done... and hit pan. I love the formula of it and how easy it is to apply, but I almost never hit pan on my eye shadows. To hit pan after using it literally 3 days is awful. I didn't think to check the size of the pots before that and now realize how SMALL the amount of product is, it is less than half the amount you get with most other cream shadow pots, so if you compare the value of this to other cream shadows, it comes out as costing a lot more per oz. As a satin shadow where you can use it as a one shadow look, the formula is a bit thick and so you end up using a bit more than you mean to. I'm sad that this shadow won't last long.
I also got lady bird, which is the glitter formula, and using this as a topper you use a lot less, so this one will last a lot longer. The glitters are all absolutely beautiful, but the colors are really similar.
faceoff_negative.headline: Beautiful and easy to use, but hit pan WAY TOO FAST
